rows.label: qst104901_msg0003
rows.name:
I-I'm fine. I usually stay
indoors, so I have no tolerance
for handsome gentlemen...

rows.label: qst104901_msg0004
rows.name: Yes... Um, I'm making a book.

rows.label: qst104901_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm planning to make a book
about beautiful flowers next.

rows.label: qst104901_msg0006
rows.name:
I want to include the ice flowers blooming
right over there in my book, but I can't
get close because of the monsters.

rows.label: qst104901_msg0007
rows.name: Is that alright...? Thank you so much~

rows.label: qst104901_msg0008
rows.name:
Aaah... I am honored to have
exchanged words with such a beautiful
person... Ugh... so dazzling...

rows.label: qst104901_msg0102
rows.name:
If a handsome gentleman
would talk to me, the cold
would surely blow away...
